docs.text: Hi there 👋 🙋‍♀️ A short introduction This organization has been created in order to host different repos that are related to Game Development. Each repository contains a different game that can be used as a Dev Kit for developing new ones. 👩‍💻 Useful resources Each repository contains a README.md file with all the information. Website: https://game-dev-kit.github.io/ Repo Organization Toolkits: 3D avatar creation Codeless3D
